entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
